## Runtime.Context.ContextQualifierProviderValidator.getByIndex() method

Gets a qualifier value by its number index, converting to strongly-typed QualifierIndex.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getByIndex(index: number): Result<QualifierContextValue>;
```

The number index to convert and look up.

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[QualifierContextValue](./ts-res.qualifiercontextvalue.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the [qualifier context value](./ts-res.qualifiercontextvalue.md) if found, or `Failure` with an error message if not found or an error occurs.
